characteristics and get a new generation
that was better
that's what we always have done and to

is not with the toolbox the problem is
with the end result many people are
comfortable with using the tools but
they're not comfortable if the end
result is a genetically modified
organism ie
a plant or an animal that has genes that
have somehow been manipulated and word
itself is already charged to become

and the whole thing hinges on what is

because we always wanted to have as

now many people draw the line in the

and it still comes close to what it what
rice was before that's okay but if we

in strawberries that's going too far and

it's the purpose for which you do the

what it comes from a gene that is

when we talk about the environmental

escaped as some people think what we

there are no super weeds occurring right

genetically engineered or manipulated
